version_description:
- Improved the quality of video chat
- Optimized operation and improved the fluency of the operation

LivU - Connect the World

Meet new people from worldwide via video chat.

-Fixed bugs and Improved performance and user experience.
LivU - Connect the World
Meet new people from worldwide via video chat

-Fixed bugs, including a crash fix for iOS 13 users.
-Improved performance and user experience.
LivU - Connect the World
Meet new people from worldwide via video chat

- Fixed bugs. Improved performance and user experience .
LivU - Connect the World
Meet new people from worldwide via video chat

1.Fixed Facebook login bug on iOS 9 and iOS 10.
2.Now you can accept who you want to match and video chat in match model.

-Fixed bugs. Improved performance and user experience.
Live - Connect the World
Meet new people from worldwide via video chat
- We fixed a few bugs and made improvements.

- Added "Add friends by ID" function. Users can search and add new friends by LivU ID now.
- Added "Text message translation" function. Users are able to send translated text to friends during video chat or text chat.
- Added "Real-time voice translation" function in iOS 10 and later systems. Users could send translated voice messages to friends during video call.
- Fixed bugs and improved user experience.
LivU - Connect the World
Meet new people from worldwide via video chat

- Added an interesting activity. Send "Likes" to your friends during random video chat. Show your love and support.
- Fixed bugs and improved user experience of video chatting.

LivU - Connect the World

Meet new people from worldwide via video chat.

Optimized the compatibility on iPhone X. Improved the user experience on iPhone X.
Optimized match system so you can match strangers faster.
Optimized registration process. Provided a faster and easier registration method.
Added new user guide to let you understand how to video chat on LivU easily.
Fixed bugs and improved user experience of video chat.
LivU - Connect the World

Meet new people from worldwide via video chat.

- Optimized registration process. Provided a faster and easier registration method.
- Optimized the user interface.
- Optimized the matching speed so you can connect with others easier and faster.
- Fixed bugs and improved user experience.
- Optimized the compatibility on iPhone X. Improved the user experience on iPhone X.

LivU - Connect the World

Meet new people from worldwide via video chat.

Added Arabic localized version. Let all Arabics have video chat much easier.
Optimized the matching speed so you can connect with others easier and faster.
Fixed bugs and improved user experience.
LivU - Connect the World

Meet new people from worldwide via video chat.

Added Hindi localized version.
Optimized Friend List. Added friend searching, favorite friend list and alias editing functions. So you can find any friends easily and differentiate your friend list.
Optimized the user interface. You can find your match history easily.
Added a notification for adding friends.
Fixed bugs and improved performance.
LivU - Connect the World

Meet new people from worldwide via random live video chat

Optimized the user interface.
Optimized the matching speed so you can connect with others easier and faster.
Fixed bugs and improved user experience.
Optimized the compatibility on iPhone X. Improved the user experience on iPhone X.
LivU - Connect the World

Meet new people from worldwide via video chat.

- Added "Add friends by ID" function. Users can search and add new friends by LivU ID now.
- Added "Text message translation" function. Users are able to send translated text to friends during video chat or text chat.
- Added "Real-time voice translation" function in iOS 10 and later systems. Users could send translated voice messages to friends during video call.
- Fixed bugs and improved user experience.

- Optimized match system so you can match strangers faster.
- Fixed bugs and improved user experience.
